posts.post_title: FS: 1950 Boston Red Sox RPPC with Ted Williams & Bobby Doerr- SOLD
posts.post_content:
For Sale: 1950 Boston Red Sox Team RPPC with Ted Williams and Bobby Doerr

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/album.php?albumid=1033&pictureid=21997[/url]

PayPal Friends & Family: [url]venezuelantopps@hotmail.com[/url]

If interested, I can pair this with the 1946 Grogan Co. Chicago White Sox team RPPC with Appling & Lyons that I also have on the BST for $50.00 postpaid.
